column1: Skinny Fit Big Pony Polo Shirt
column3: Introduced in 1972, our Polo shirt now comes in a variety of colors and styles but remains just as iconic as the original. This skinny cotton mesh version features our signature embroidered Big Pony and a tennis tail to keep the shirt in place when tucked in. Endlessly versatile, it's a chic match for jeans or a ballgown skirt.
column4:
Skinny Fit: a body-conscious silhouette without any stretch. Our Polo shirts also come in Boyfriend Fit (our roomiest fit), Classic Fit (our second-roomiest fit), and Skinny Stretch Fit, which has elastane.
Size medium has a 24" front body length, a 25" back body length, and a 35" bust.
Ribbed Polo collar. Two-button placket.
Short sleeves with ribbed armbands.
Tennis tail.
Signature embroidered Big Pony at the left chest.
100% cotton.
Machine washable. Imported.
Model is 5'10"/178 cm and has a 32" bust. She wears a size small.
